TopicTitle: The "You know you're playing a lot of KSP when..." thread

Articles.Content: When the excitement of (every other) Friday comes not from the fact that it is friday, but the show and tells.
when you think about the best way to make a lander for 20 crew without sacrificeing the stability of the lander
you know you play ksp too much when your gamedata folders size is 30 gb cuz of mods
